name: Beat Fight - Full Mod Battle
description:
A new free music rhythm game.
How to play

1.Tap the colorful note as it reaches scoring area.
2. According to the accuracy of tap you'll get a score.
3. Try to challenge harder songs.
Various types of songs and well-made Musical score is continuously update. Pop, Anime, Hip-hop, EDM, Vocaloid, and more genre of music are waiting for you.

Game Features
1.Variou of songs, play anytime as you want.
2.Choose your own character
3.Different difficulty makes more choice, choose the difficulty that you like the most!
4.Use high quality music source and musical score, make your game experience better.
5.Continuously update various songs.

Install right now and enjoy it!
Beat Fight is a music game from Jingmao Tec. Contact us by App Store or email below. We're looking forward to your game feedback to improve our game!
